Title: Spice World
Writer: Spice Girls (idea), Kim Fuller (idea), Kim Fuller, Jamie Curtis (additional writing)
Actors: Mel B, Emma Bunton, Melanie C, Geri Horner
Plot: Climb aboard the double decker Spice Bus and get ready for a madcap musical adventure with the sexy phenomenons of pop - the Spice Girls. An encounter with extra-terrestrials, a night in a haunted castle, and a moment of truth in a maternity ward are just a few of the escapades the endeavored upon as the Girls gear up for their first live concert at London's Royal Albert Hall.
Production: Fragile Films, Columbia Pictures, Icon Entertainment International, PolyGram Filmed Entertainment
